```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

```

## R Markdown


Read in csv
```{r}
DATA <- read_csv('/Users/chris/Desktop/Fall_2019/ENEC_698/SMR_Weighted_Ranking.csv')

DATA1 <- DATA %>%
  gather(Metrics,MetricValue,  MWe:`Construction Time`)
```


Figure of all reactors
```{r}
ggplot(DATA1)+
  geom_col(aes(x=Reactor,y=MetricValue, fill = fct_rev(Metrics))) +
  ylab("Scoring")+
  ggtitle("Final Reactor Scoring")+
  theme(legend.title=element_blank())


```

Faceted reactor scoring
```{r echo=FALSE}
ggplot(DATA1)+
  geom_col(aes(x=Metrics, y=MetricValue, fill=Metrics))+
  facet_wrap(Reactor~.)+
  theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle=45,hjust=1))
```
